locations.name: Little Europe
locations.description: A DISTRICT DIVIDED BETWEEN CLASSES AND TIMES, WITH OLD BRICK BUILDINGS STANDING NEXT TO FUTURISTIC SKYSCRAPERS.

locations.name: Camden Court
locations.description: A secure apartment complex favored by solos and execs.

locations.name: Choppers
locations.description: Formerly a butchers shop, now a bar. the meat grinder still works if you want to get rid of a body.

locations.name: Continental   Brands   Vertical Neighborhood
locations.description: Housing for continental brands employees. a nightmare to navigate due to its flavors of the world theming.

locations.name: Cube-A-Rama
locations.description: A cube hotel with an original brick exterior.

locations.name: Danger Gal Housing Facility
locations.description: Housing for danger gal employees. pink and full of life.

locations.name: Danger Gal Offices
locations.description: Home base for danger gal, a private investigation and security neocorp.

locations.name: FiddlerS Green
locations.description: An irish pub thats about as irish as green beer on saint pattys day.

locations.name: GretaS
locations.description: The best pool hall in night city, with a strong lesbian client base.

locations.name: Holy Angels Church
locations.description: A catholic church run by father kevin and father paul. known far and wide as neutral ground in night city.

locations.name: Paradiso Terrestre
locations.description: An upscale southern neo-italian dining experience. meals by appointment only.

locations.name: Short Circuit
locations.description: Night citys premiere tech and netrunner bar. owned and operated by brain and his husband 3-piece.

locations.name: SopranoS
locations.description: An italian restaurant that leans heavily into its mafioso theming. the real mob gives it a pass.

locations.name: Torrell And ChiangS
locations.description: Considered by many to be the best tailors in night city.

locations.name: Upper Marina
locations.description: A BUSTLING DISTRICT WITH A MIX OF OLD INDUSTRIAL ZONES AND GENTRIFIED NEIGHBORHOODS BUILT AROUND A SERIES OF DOCKS AND SMALL MARINAS.

locations.name: The Afterlife
locations.description: The premiere edgerunner bar in night city. owned by the legendary solo, rogue.

locations.name: BuffaloS
locations.description: The latest in a long line of failing restaurants opened in this location. serves global fusion cuisine.

locations.name: City Medical Center
locations.description: An enormous hospital complex housing some of the best medical staff and technology in night city.

locations.name: The Garden Of Earthly Delights
locations.description: A full hedo-nistic experience brothel. a visit starts with dinner and ends with time spent with meat puppets programmed to the client’s specifications.

locations.name: Graffitix
locations.description: An art gallery displaying the work of night citys best up-and-coming artists.

locations.name: La Lune Blue
locations.description: A high-end french restaurant.

locations.name: Marina Floathomes
locations.description: A collection of small houseboats for rent.

locations.name: Mccartney Cubes
locations.description: A cube hotel near the stadium.

locations.name: Mccartney Field Stadium
locations.description: A 75,000 seat stadium and the heart of night citys sports and concert scene. franchises calling the stadium home include the slammers (baseball), heat (basketball), death dealers (combat soccer), nuke (murderball), and the new battlegrounds championship wrestling league.

locations.name: Night City Bubbles
locations.description: A high-end spa. some employees can be hired as escorts for the evening.

locations.name: Reo Meatwagon Offices
locations.description: Home of night citys second-biggest ems operation.

locations.name: Travlstay Citycenter
locations.description: A cube hotel with paper-thin walls and absolutely no security.

locations.name: Downtown
locations.description: A NEW DISTRICT CARVED OUT OF LITTLE EUROPE BY MISTER KERNIGHAN AND A CONSORTIUM OF FIXERS AND EXECS KNOWN AS THE CHAMBER OF COMMERCE. DOWNTOWN IS PREPARING FOR NIGHT CITY’S FULL REBIRTH BY CREATING THE MOST COM-MERCIALLY FRIENDLY DISTRICT ON THE ISLAND.
locations.city_manager: EMILIA ORTEGA (APPOINTED BY CHAMBER OF COMMERCE)

locations.name: Acadia Way
locations.description: A single street containing restored bungalows, gated away from the rest of the world.
locations.city_manager: EMILIA ORTEGA (APPOINTED BY CHAMBER OF COMMERCE)

locations.name: Continental Brands Offices
locations.description: The night city headquarters of food juggernaut continental brands. also home to the oasis megamart, the largest grocery store in the city.
locations.city_manager: EMILIA ORTEGA (APPOINTED BY CHAMBER OF COMMERCE)

locations.name: Cortex Complex
locations.description: An ugly office building that vaguely resembles a human brain. home to jack skorkowski real estate and dizcom, an industrial design firm.
locations.city_manager: EMILIA ORTEGA (APPOINTED BY CHAMBER OF COMMERCE)

locations.name: Delirium
locations.description: A gothpunk virtuality club.
locations.city_manager: EMILIA ORTEGA (APPOINTED BY CHAMBER OF COMMERCE)

locations.name: Night City Firestation #2
locations.description: The most well-funded firestation in night city. it is well fortified, well equipped, and employs a number of fbc firefighters.
locations.city_manager: EMILIA ORTEGA (APPOINTED BY CHAMBER OF COMMERCE)

locations.name: The Hot Zone
locations.description: FORMERLY THE CENTRAL CITY CORPORATE ZONE. NOW, A BLEAK LANDSCAPE RIDDLES WITH TWISTED, WRECKED SKYSCRAPERS. IT SHRINKS A BIT EACH YEAR AS THE EDGES ARE CLEARED AND REBUILT.

locations.name: The Ashcroft Hotel
locations.description: Once the most luxurious hotel in night city. now the center of maelstroms hot zone scavenging operations.

locations.name: The N54
locations.description: The former home of network 54 in night city. the tallest structure still standing in the hot zone climbing it and tagging the top has become a tradition among urbanauts.

locations.name: ToggleS Temple
locations.description: An underground firearms range and obstacle course run by a conspiracy theorist named toggle.

locations.name: Totentanz
locations.description: A chrome metal club and home base for maelstrom.

locations.name: Little China
locations.description: A STRUGGLING COMMUNITY ATTEMPTING TO CRAWL ITS WAY OUT OF THE COMBAT ZONES AND INTO THE REBUILDING URBAN CENTER.
locations.city_manager: DAVID LING PO (APPOINTED BY THE LITTLE CHINA REDEVELOPMENT ASSOCIATION)

locations.name: Bridgetown
locations.description: A cargo container community stacked under the end of the pelican boulevard over-pass. it isn’t uncommon for bodies to wash up on the waterfront nearby.
locations.city_manager: DAVID LING PO (APPOINTED BY THE LITTLE CHINA REDEVELOPMENT ASSOCIATION)

locations.name: Chrome Cross
locations.description: A dive bar frequented by the red chrome legion.
locations.city_manager: DAVID LING PO (APPOINTED BY THE LITTLE CHINA REDEVELOPMENT ASSOCIATION)

locations.name: Forlorn Hope
locations.description: The home of the forlorn hope, a venerable edgerunner bar and night city institu-tion (before the events of tales of the red: hope reborn).
locations.city_manager: DAVID LING PO (APPOINTED BY THE LITTLE CHINA REDEVELOPMENT ASSOCIATION)

locations.name: Gu ngb Tower
locations.description: A symbol of little chinas aspirations for the future, this restored tower houses a number of organizations and businesses, including the ling po public library and virtex’s virtuality venue.
locations.city_manager: DAVID LING PO (APPOINTED BY THE LITTLE CHINA REDEVELOPMENT ASSOCIATION)

locations.name: Prosperity Gardens Tenements
locations.description: A block of mixed-use apartments holding way too many people. for mysterious reasons, it is also one of the safest places to live in little china.
locations.city_manager: DAVID LING PO (APPOINTED BY THE LITTLE CHINA REDEVELOPMENT ASSOCIATION)

locations.name: University District
locations.description: A SLIM DISTRICT HOUSING THE CITYS ONLY TRADITIONAL INSTITU-TION OF HIGHER LEARNING.

locations.name: Biotechnica Campus
locations.description: The headquarters of biotechnica in night city. strange sounds can be heard from the campus at night.

locations.name: Biotechnica Habitation Sphere Alpha
locations.description: A geodesic dome serving as housing for biotechnica employees.

locations.name: Night City Symphony Hall
locations.description: A performance space owned and operated by the philharmonic vampyres.

locations.name: Night City University
locations.description: A college campus built up into something of a fortified monastery. the center of higher education in night city.

locations.name: Parkside Living
locations.description: Apartments occupied primar-ily by ncu students and some faculty. always loud and boisterous.

locations.name: Princessland!
locations.description: An abandoned carnival themed around an old animated show. now home to the princesses of justice.

locations.name: Stems & Seeds
locations.description: A guerilla gardening operation run by lily larson, a former researcher for petrochem.

locations.name: University Cubes
locations.description: Cheap rooms for university students on a budget.

locations.name: Yewtree
locations.description: A neo-hipster bar working in collusion with ncu security to keep students quiet while drinking in the district.

locations.name: The Glen
locations.description: THE ADMINISTRATIVE CENTER OF NIGHT CITY; FULL OF MOVERS, SHAKERS, AND POWER PLAYERS.

locations.name: 1St Night City Bank
locations.description: The largest bank in night city and the most likely source of loan money for local projects (usually lent to people with plenty of money of their own).

locations.name: Air
locations.description: An oxygen bar for those who can afford the fresh stuff.

locations.name: BearS
locations.description: Famous for its microbrew selection and the moth-eaten bear head sitting above the bar.

locations.name: City Hall
locations.description: The seat of local government in night city.

locations.name: City Police Precinct #1
locations.description: The first line of defense against the gangs of the combat zones for those who can afford it.

locations.name: Club Atlantis
locations.description: A glamorous, multi-level club with a flashy, avant-garde, and disorienting style.

locations.name: Glenlife Perfected
locations.description: An apartment building. looks great on the outside. not so great on the inside.

locations.name: Hall Of Justice
locations.description: Courthouse and jail all in one. an imposing, brutalist structure.

locations.name: Kasims
locations.description: A turkish coffee and tobacco bar. closed on fridays so the owner and his family can attend prayers.

locations.name: Merrill, Asukaga & Finch Offices
locations.description: The night city headquarters of the worlds largest inde-pendent financial and investment institution. the tall skyscraper houses additional businesses.

locations.name: Night City Plaza
locations.description: A beautiful park open to the public. the largest green space in night city.

locations.name: Raven Microcybernetics
locations.description: Night city headquarters for a major cybernetics company. the skyscraper also houses some of the company’s close business partners.

locations.name: Seafoam
locations.description: A cube hotel close to club atlantis. the party never stops here, though revelers sometimes wake up after a bender missing money, inventory, or chrome courtesy of the reckoners.

locations.name: Old Japantown
locations.description: MOST OF NIGHT CITYS ETHNIC JAPANESE POPULATION HAS MOVED NORTH, BUT ENOUGH STILL CLING TOGETHER HERE TO FORM ISLANDS OF CIVILIZATION IN A SEA OF COMBAT ZONE CHAOS.
locations.city_manager: ADRIANE CASSELLE (ELECTED BY LOCAL FAMILY HEADS)

locations.name: Crisis Medical Center
locations.description: A no-questions asked medical center supplied with surprisingly advanced technology. multiple corps use it as a staging ground to run medical experiments.
locations.city_manager: ADRIANE CASSELLE (ELECTED BY LOCAL FAMILY HEADS)

locations.name: Highcourt Plaza Hotel
locations.description: A classy and well-de-fended hotel providing excellent service. most guests arrive via av to avoid driving through a combat zone.
locations.city_manager: ADRIANE CASSELLE (ELECTED BY LOCAL FAMILY HEADS)

locations.name: Honest HiroS Used Cars
locations.description: A used car deal-ership supplied by the steel vaqueros (and other nomads) and protected by edgerunners who trade service for vehicles.
locations.city_manager: ADRIANE CASSELLE (ELECTED BY LOCAL FAMILY HEADS)

locations.name: Mrs. SuzukiS Bodega
locations.description: The most secure and stable market in old japantown. known for being the only distribution point for mushrooms grown by the shroomers.
locations.city_manager: ADRIANE CASSELLE (ELECTED BY LOCAL FAMILY HEADS)

locations.name: The Precipice
locations.description: A cargo container community. many of the residents earn extra cash by volunteering for experiments at crisis medical.
locations.city_manager: ADRIANE CASSELLE (ELECTED BY LOCAL FAMILY HEADS)

locations.name: Unnamed Cube Hotel
locations.description: The rooms are cleaned out by ceiling-mounted water jets, and the locks on the doors are dodgy, but at least there are no cameras and no questions.
locations.city_manager: ADRIANE CASSELLE (ELECTED BY LOCAL FAMILY HEADS)

locations.name: South Night City
locations.description: A SPRAWLING MIX OF INDUSTRY AND RESIDENTIAL BUILDINGS. IT IS A COMBAT ZONE PRIMARILY BECAUSE THE CITY MANAGER, GAVEN HAAKENSEN, CARES MORE ABOUT LINING HIS POCKETS THAN HE DOES DOING HIS JOB. THAT DOESN’T MAKE HIM UNUSUAL, BUT HE’S MORE BLATANT ABOUT IT THAN MOST. CITY  MANAGER:  GARVEN  HAAKENSEN (SELF-APPOINTED) SECURITY PROVIDER: SCYTHE SECURITY GANGS PRESENT: BOZOS, DEADWOODS, THE ENHANCED, KANZAKI FAMILY, KILL KRASHERS, THE RECKONERS, THE SINFUL ADAMS, TYGER CLAWS, THE ZONERS ▶ SOUTH NIGHT CITY LOCATIONS ◀ (I1) THE BONEYARD: FORMERLY THE NIGHT CITY GARDEN OF REST. NOW A SHANTY TOWN AND HOME TO THE SINFUL ADAMS. THEY RUN AN ANNUAL FESTIVAL ON HALLOWEEN FOR THE DISTRICT’S RESIDENTS. (I2) MINDNUTZ LOVER: THE HOTTEST BRAINDANCE CLUB IN SOUTH NIGHT CITY. (I3) SAVAGE DOCS: A MULTI-RIPPERDOC OPERATION OF GOOD REPUTATION PROTECTED BY BOTH THE YAKUZA AND THE TYGER CLAWS (DESPITE THEIR DIFFERENCES). (I4) SILVERHAND STUDIOS: APARTMENTS AND STUDIO SPACE RENTED OUT TO ARTISTS AND MUSICIANS. RUN BY THE COUSIN OF LEGENDARY ROCKERBOY KERRY EURODYNE. (I5) THE SLAMMER: A GANGER BAR. HOME OF THE ARENA, A NO-HOLDS-BARRED COMBAT RING GANGERS CAN STEP INTO TO SETTLE THEIR DISPUTES WITHOUT MURDER. (I6) SOUTH CARGO VILLAGE: A CARGO CONTAINER COM-MUNITY. DESPITE BEING ON THE BORDER OF THE GLEN, IT IS STILL IN A COMBAT ZONE, AND THE COPS TREAT IT AS SUCH. (I7) UNION CHAPEL BUILDING: ONCE AN ARCHITECTURAL LANDMARK. NOW ABANDONED, IN THEORY. SOME THINK THE RECKONERS USE THE BASEMENT AS A REFUGE. (I8) UNIVERSITY CARGO BAY: CARGO CONTAINER HOUSING FOR UNIVERSITY STUDENTS. PORT OF NIGHT CITY (J) A CENTRAL LOCATION FOR CARGO ENTERING AND LEAVING NIGHT CITY BY SEA. RUN BY NOMADS FROM THE THELAS NATION.

locations.name: Dock 13
locations.description: The storefront (and occasional night market) of marketing genius willy mister amaaaze maze.

locations.name: Dock 14 Studio Apartments
locations.description: An apartment building just one dock away from the always loud dock 13.

locations.name: Dock Cargo Community
locations.description: A cargo container community nestled between the docks.

locations.name: Flotsam
locations.description: A small drift town just off the coast. it consists of several larger vessels run aground con-nected by smaller boats, rafts, and walkways. the randy dandy, a mobile bar, often docks here.

locations.name: Medical Technologies
locations.description: A body bank special-izing in growing replacement limbs. known for buying and selling dodgy cyberware as well.

locations.name: RustyS Dive Shack
locations.description: A rough-and-tumble bar for sea-faring types. built out of the bridge of an old container sub.

locations.name: South Night City Reclaimed Studio
locations.description: An apart-ment building near the water. leaving the building risks encountering gangers visiting medical technologies.

locations.name: Reclamation Zone
locations.description: A SMALL ENCLAVE RUN BY NOMADS TURNED RECLAIMERS. THEYVE TAKEN OVER THE OPERATION OF NIGHT CITYS PUBLIC TRANSPORTATION, EXCHANGING THEIR TECHNICAL AND MOTOR SKILLS FOR THE LAND.

locations.name: HerschelS Crematorium
locations.description: A funeral home run by an undertaker who truly believes everyone deserves a dignified sendoff into the next life.

locations.name: Old Combat Zone
locations.description: IN THE LATE 2010S AND EARLY 2020S, NIGHT CITY BEGAN EXPANDING THE ISLAND BY FILLING IN LAND TO THE SOUTHEAST. IN THE AFTERMATH OF THE 4TH CORPORATE WAR, WHAT WAS INTENDED TO BE A SHINING BEACON OF INDUSTRIAL MIGHT DEVOLVED INTO THE WORST COMBAT ZONE NIGHT CITY HAD EVER SEEN. SLOWLY, INCH BY INCH, GROUPS OF EDGERUNNERS HAVE STRIVED TO REBUILD IT.
locations.city_manager: BRICK COLEMAN (AS LEADER OF EDGERUNNERS INC)

locations.name: From The Ashes
locations.description: A sliding scale clinic run by phoenix redwyne.
locations.city_manager: BRICK COLEMAN (AS LEADER OF EDGERUNNERS INC)

locations.name: Jesse James Kosher Deli
locations.description: More of a saloon than a deli, though for a small fortune you can get a pretty good corned beef on rye.
locations.city_manager: BRICK COLEMAN (AS LEADER OF EDGERUNNERS INC)

locations.name: Nc Ionic Semiconductor Building
locations.description: A fac-tory-turned-cargo community. many iron sights stash family members here for safety.
locations.city_manager: BRICK COLEMAN (AS LEADER OF EDGERUNNERS INC)

locations.name: The Underground
locations.description: The home of the shroomers, located deep beneath the streets of night city.
locations.city_manager: BRICK COLEMAN (AS LEADER OF EDGERUNNERS INC)

locations.name: Norcal Military Base
locations.description: HOME OF THE ESTERO BAY MILITARY COG (A MIXTURE OF VARIOUS MILITARY UNITS INTO A SINGLE ORGANIZED GROUP). IN THEORY, THE COG IS LOYAL TO NORCAL AND THE PACIFICA CONFEDERATION, BUT THEY’VE ALSO MADE A DEAL WITH MILITECH, TRADING LAND AND ACCESS FOR TRAINING AND MUNITIONS.

locations.name: Militech Corporate Operatives Housing
locations.description: Secure housing for militech employees.

locations.name: Militech Offices
locations.description: Night city headquarters for militech, a one-stop shop for all your military and security needs.

locations.name: Watson Development
locations.description: A DEVELOPING DISTRICT BUILT UP BY THE NIGHT CITY CO-PROSPERITY SPHERE (NCCS), AN ALLIANCE OF VARIOUS CORPORATIONS (PRI-MARILY OF JAPANESE ORIGIN). LAST YEAR, COMMUNITY ORGANIZER LUCIUS RHYNE LED A DISTRICT-WIDE LABOR STRIKE, FORCING THE NCCS TO ORGANIZE A GENERAL ELECTION FOR CITY MANAGER. RHYNE WON THE RESULTING RACE HANDILY.

locations.name: City Police Precinct #3
locations.description: A large, well-armed police precinct. the egos of some cops here took a bruis-ing when they were unable to break up the labor strike.

locations.name: Htown
locations.description: A tent city built outside the walls of a gated community. tensions are high.

locations.name: Petrochem & Sovoil Joint Temporary Housing Solution
locations.description: In a twist of irony, both petrochem and sovoil provide employee housing in the same building. no one is happy about it.

locations.name: Petrochem Offices
locations.description: The heavily defended headquarters of petrochem in night city. theres a small museum dedicated to the history of petroleum. across the street from the sovoil offices.

locations.name: Red Oktober
locations.description: A soviet-themed bar built into an old subway station.

locations.name: Redline
locations.description: Home of the most thrilling bloodsport in night city and the wild things, a gang dedicated to organized competitive violence.

locations.name: SakuraS
locations.description: A night city interpretation of an izakaya, an informal bar.

locations.name: Smash/Cut
locations.description: An edm club where the chromed up go to dance, do drugs, and have anonymous sex.

locations.name: Sovoil Offices
locations.description: Night city headquarters for sovoil. completely off-limits to the public. across the street from the petrochem offices.

locations.name: Trauma Team Corporate Living Center
locations.description: Housing for trauma team employees.

locations.name: Trauma Team Tower
locations.description: Night city headquar-ters for trauma team. includes an av repair bay and a hospital for the exclusive use of executive-level clients.

locations.name: Vargtimmen
locations.description: A neo-pagan mead bar. famous for their solstice and equinox parties.

locations.name: Watson Central Cubelife
locations.description: A bog standard cube hotel.

locations.name: Kabuki
locations.description: A SMALL DISTRICT CENTERED AROUND THE NAKAGAWA KABUKI THEATER. COMMON WISDOM HOLDS THAT WHILE WATSON ACTS AS THE ARMS AND LEGS OF THE NIGHT CITY CO-PROSPERITY SPHERE, KABUKI IS ITS BRAIN AND HEART.

locations.name: Nakagawa Kabuki Theater
locations.description: The most magnificent building in northside. home to a kabuki troupe said to be the equal of any in japan, as well as a museum and the central offices of the tyger claws leadership.

locations.name: Yum Seng
locations.description: A host and hostess bar famous for its seafood and soundproof karaoke boxes.

locations.name: New Westbrook
locations.description: AN URBAN SPRAWL BUILT IN THE REMAINS OF AN UPSCALE SUBURB. IT MIXES GLITZ AND GLAM WITH TENT CITIES AND LOW-RENT HOUSING. MOST OF THE NORTHERN PART OF THE DISTRICT IS OCCUPIED BY A WALLED-OFF FAKE CITY WHERE NETWORK 54 RUNS AND FILMS THE COMBAT ZONE, A BATTLE ROYALE “GAME SHOW” IN WHICH FIFTY PEOPLE ENTER AND ONLY ONE GETS TO LEAVE ALIVE WITH A YEAR’S WORTH OF REAL CHICKEN DINNERS AS THE PRIZE.
locations.city_manager: BELKIS ABERA (APPOINTED BY WORLDSAT AND NETWORK 54)

locations.name: Canalside Plaza
locations.description: A strip mall. home to the sizzle jams talent agency, a rickshaws, a capitn caliente restaurant, the mane event hair and nail salon, and an oasis.
locations.city_manager: BELKIS ABERA (APPOINTED BY WORLDSAT AND NETWORK 54)

locations.name: ChatelaineS
locations.description: An early 20th-century style cabaret and burlesque queer club so popular it attracts a number of straight tourists.
locations.city_manager: BELKIS ABERA (APPOINTED BY WORLDSAT AND NETWORK 54)

locations.name: DillyS
locations.description: A love hotel with a unique mascot a cartoon pickle wearing a rolled-up condom as a beanie.
locations.city_manager: BELKIS ABERA (APPOINTED BY WORLDSAT AND NETWORK 54)

locations.name: Evergreen Apartments
locations.description: A former big box store transformed into a cube hotel. for the right price, the landlord is more than happy to evict existing tenants for you.
locations.city_manager: BELKIS ABERA (APPOINTED BY WORLDSAT AND NETWORK 54)

locations.name: Network 54 Offices
locations.description: The night city head-quarters and broadcasting tower for network 54.
locations.city_manager: BELKIS ABERA (APPOINTED BY WORLDSAT AND NETWORK 54)

locations.name: Network 54 Westbrook Private Acres
locations.description: A gated community of duplexes for the use of network 54 employees.
locations.city_manager: BELKIS ABERA (APPOINTED BY WORLDSAT AND NETWORK 54)

locations.name: Night City Firestation #1
locations.description: A well-supplied firestation. it specializes in av-based firefighting.
locations.city_manager: BELKIS ABERA (APPOINTED BY WORLDSAT AND NETWORK 54)

locations.name: North Cargo Village
locations.description: A cargo container com-munity stacked in an abandoned parking lot.
locations.city_manager: BELKIS ABERA (APPOINTED BY WORLDSAT AND NETWORK 54)

locations.name: Rocklin Augmentics Campus
locations.description: Night city headquarters of rocklin augmentics, including offices, meeting spaces, and a research hospital.
locations.city_manager: BELKIS ABERA (APPOINTED BY WORLDSAT AND NETWORK 54)

locations.name: Rocklin Augmentics Innovation Hub
locations.description: Corporate housing for rocklin augmentics employees. they are encouraged to use the various maker spaces built inside.
locations.city_manager: BELKIS ABERA (APPOINTED BY WORLDSAT AND NETWORK 54)

locations.name: Worldsat Offices
locations.description: A heavily defended com-pound on the edge of the city. it is not only the local headquarters of worldsat but also the junction point for satellite communications between night city and the outside world.
locations.city_manager: BELKIS ABERA (APPOINTED BY WORLDSAT AND NETWORK 54)

locations.name: Charter Hill
locations.description: A SMALL BUT INFLUENTIAL COMMUNITY. ON A CLEAR DAY, THE RESIDENTS OF CHARTER HILL CAN SEE THE WALLS OF THE EXEC ZONE AND DREAM OF CLIMBING EVEN HIGHER ON THE CORPORATE LADDER.

locations.name: Exec Zone
locations.description: THE SINGLE MOST SECURE DISTRICT IN NIGHT CITY. ONLY THE TRULY ELITE LIVE HERE.
locations.city_manager: DOCTOR KAREN DAVIES (ELECTED BY HOME OWNERS ASSOCIATION)

locations.name: Heywood Docks
locations.description: AS THE WORLD RETURNS TO NORMAL, CORPORATIONS ARE LOOKING TO CUT THE NOMAD NATIONS OUT OF THE SHIPPING AND LOGISTICS EQUATION. LARGER VESSELS CAN’T USE THE HEYWOOD DOCKS, BUT SMALLER, CORPORATE-SPONSORED SHIPS MOVING UP AND DOWN THE WEST COAST CAN.

locations.name: Greenbox Storage Units
locations.description: Technically a secure storage facility, but customers have been known to live inside the units.

locations.name: North Heywood
locations.description: OVER THE PAST DECADE, HEYWOOD HAS BEEN DIVIDED INTO TWO DISTRICTS. IN THE NORTH ARE WORKADAY RESIDENTS, MANY OF WHOM HAVE FOUND JOBS IN THE NEARBY HEYWOOD INDUSTRIAL ZONE.
locations.city_manager: BARRY BIG DEAL DELVECCHIO (APPOINTED BY DISTRICT COUNCIL)

locations.name: Acorn Towers
locations.description: A dual-tower apartment complex housing dynalar employees.
locations.city_manager: BARRY BIG DEAL DELVECCHIO (APPOINTED BY DISTRICT COUNCIL)

locations.name: The Armory
locations.description: A former national guard armory transformed into the headquarters of 6th street.
locations.city_manager: BARRY BIG DEAL DELVECCHIO (APPOINTED BY DISTRICT COUNCIL)

locations.name: Biotechnica Palm Grove
locations.description: A grove of experimental palm trees owned and monitored by biotechnica.
locations.city_manager: BARRY BIG DEAL DELVECCHIO (APPOINTED BY DISTRICT COUNCIL)

locations.name: Converted Motel Studio Apartments
locations.description: A no-name motel transformed into no-name apartments on the edge of the city.
locations.city_manager: BARRY BIG DEAL DELVECCHIO (APPOINTED BY DISTRICT COUNCIL)

locations.name: Dynalar Campus
locations.description: The regional headquarters of dynalar, a popular cyberware and electronics company.
locations.city_manager: BARRY BIG DEAL DELVECCHIO (APPOINTED BY DISTRICT COUNCIL)

locations.name: Forlorn Hope
locations.description: The home of the forlorn hope, a venerable edgerunner bar and night city institu-tion (after the events of tales of the red: hope reborn).
locations.city_manager: BARRY BIG DEAL DELVECCHIO (APPOINTED BY DISTRICT COUNCIL)

locations.name: Nana MeowS Nursery
locations.description: Not a guerilla garden itself but a shop that supplies gear and seeds to guerilla gardeners.
locations.city_manager: BARRY BIG DEAL DELVECCHIO (APPOINTED BY DISTRICT COUNCIL)

locations.name: Night City Animal Shelter
locations.description: A former veteri-narian clinic now occupied by a ripperdoc. it special-izes in exotics and bioexotics.
locations.city_manager: BARRY BIG DEAL DELVECCHIO (APPOINTED BY DISTRICT COUNCIL)

locations.name: Woodland Park
locations.description: A small neighborhood near the dynalar campus. highlights include the burning bright bodega, breeze (a mom and pop drug store), the palms cargo container community, the shark apartment building, and the zolletta cube hotel.
locations.city_manager: BARRY BIG DEAL DELVECCHIO (APPOINTED BY DISTRICT COUNCIL)

locations.name: Xanadu
locations.description: A roller derby rink and disco tech. home of the muses.
locations.city_manager: BARRY BIG DEAL DELVECCHIO (APPOINTED BY DISTRICT COUNCIL)

locations.name: Heywood Industrial Zone
locations.description: THE LARGEST INDUSTRIAL ZONE IN NIGHT CITY, OVERFLOWING WITH WAREHOUSES, CONSTRUCTION EQUIPMENT, FACTORIES, AND EVEN SOME DERELICT CARGO SHIPS.
locations.city_manager: THEO WALKER (APPOINTED BY THE ARROYO CONCERN)

locations.name: D.V. Rambling Rose
locations.description: An ancient vessel stuck in dry dock. home base for fixies couriers.
locations.city_manager: THEO WALKER (APPOINTED BY THE ARROYO CONCERN)

locations.name: Old Ironworks Building
locations.description: The inside has been converted into apartments, and the landlords have stacked cargo container housing on the roof.
locations.city_manager: THEO WALKER (APPOINTED BY THE ARROYO CONCERN)

locations.name: YangS Wheels
locations.description: The headquarters, manu-facturing factory, and warehouse of yang’s wheels, night city’s biggest provider of inexpensive wheeled transportation.
locations.city_manager: THEO WALKER (APPOINTED BY THE ARROYO CONCERN)

locations.name: Zhirafa Office Park
locations.description: The night city head-quarters of zhirafa. drones are used for both labor and security.
locations.city_manager: THEO WALKER (APPOINTED BY THE ARROYO CONCERN)

locations.name: Zhirafa Office Park Microvillage
locations.description: Corporate housing for zhirafa employees, colorfully disguised as cargo containers.
locations.city_manager: THEO WALKER (APPOINTED BY THE ARROYO CONCERN)

locations.name: Santo Domingo
locations.description: SOUTH HEYWOOD IS BETTER KNOWN BY THE LOCALS AS SANTO DOMINO. THE NOMAD CAMP NEAR THE DAM HEAVILY INFLU-ENCES THE DISTRICT, BUT THE ALDECALDOS POWER MAY BE WANING. THERESA VALENTINO, AN INDEPENDENT CANDIDATE, RECENTLY WON THE ELECTION FOR CITY MANAGER THANKS TO BACKING FROM THE EL NORTE CARTEL.

locations.name: Aldecaldo Camp
locations.description: A large multi-cultural encampment sitting at the base of the petrochem dam. while all nomads are welcome, the camp is primarily dominated by the aldecaldos.

locations.name: City Police Precinct #2
locations.description: Large but over-worked, the cops here rely heavily on drones to patrol their beats.

locations.name: East Cargo Village
locations.description: A dusty cargo container community located near the edge of the city.

locations.name: Heywood Suites
locations.description: An apartment complex situated beneath one of the most heavily trafficked overpasses in night city. many residents have lev-el-dampening cyberware installed.

locations.name: MaraS
locations.description: A family-owned beer tent located just inside the city limits.

locations.name: Metalstorm
locations.description: A seemingly indestructible bar located under the pacifica bridge. popular with fbcs.

locations.name: WoodchipperS Garage
locations.description: The home base of woodchipper, the most influential nomad fixer in night city. she throws her famous night markets/ block parties in the cul-de-sac to the southwest.

locations.name: Rancho Coronado
locations.description: TECHNICALLY PART OF NIGHT CITY, NO ONE HAS YET BOTHERED TO PONY UP THE CASH TO BUY RANCHO CORONADO’S SEAT ON THE CITY COUNCIL. AS A RESULT, THE DISTRICT LACKS IN JUST ABOUT EVERY RESOURCE, FROM UTILITIES TO FIRE AND POLICE SERVICES.

locations.name: Albino Alligator Carwash
locations.description: Home base for the albino alligators. also one of the most reliable places to find clean drinking water in the district.

locations.name: Coronado Heights
locations.description: An apartment building so close to pacifica that it might as well be part of it.

locations.name: Eagle Rock Stadium
locations.description: A former football field transformed into a cargo container community.

locations.name: Jack N The Green
locations.description: A guerilla gardening outfit run by reclaimers.

locations.name: Minimallism
locations.description: Once a mall catering to eager beaverville consumers, now an empty husk claimed on one side by reclaimers and on the other by a consor-tium of fixers who take turns running night markets there. also known as the rc night market by residents.
